function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low level of experience in improving occupant health in commercial and industrial buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in commercial and industrial environments due to lack of focus on occupant health.","Mitigation":"Providing training and resources for professionals to improve occupant health in commercial and industrial buildings.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, HVAC systems, and antimicrobial surfaces.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and employees in commercial and industrial buildings.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and health and safety departments."},{"Description":"Limited studies and research on occupant health in commercial and industrial buildings.","Impact":"Lack of understanding about the impact of building design on occupant health in commercial and industrial environments.","Mitigation":"Encouraging and funding research on occupant health in commercial and industrial buildings.","Technologies":"Biometric sensors, data analytics, and simulation software for building design and performance.","People":"Researchers, academics, and public health officials.","Owner":"Funding agencies, research institutions, and government bodies."},{"Description":"Importance given to office spaces in research and practice, leading to neglect of other building types.","Impact":"Unequal attention to occupant health in different building types, increasing the risk of disease transmission in neglected building environments.","Mitigation":"Promoting awareness and investment in occupant health in neglected building types.","Technologies":"Indoor air quality sensors, ventilation systems, and building automation systems.","People":"Occupants, building managers, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Government agencies, building owners, and industry associations."}]}
